lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You play an RPG and you want to farm gold. You just found an interesting quest for which you know loot stats.
Given earnings and probabilities, determine the expected value (mathematically speaking) you'll earn after having completed this quest lots of times, rounded to 2 decimal places.
Please note that sometimes the quest has negative earnings!
Input
Line 1: N the number of possible earnings.
Next N lines: Two space-separated floats
earning the amount of the loot
probability the probability you'll earn that amount
Output
Line 1: expected_value as float rounded to 2 decimal places.
Constraints
Sum of probabilities is always one (no invalid input).
Example
Input
4
1 0.2
50 0.4
75 0.3
1000 0.1
Output
142.70
